content:
Set-AzureRmVMBackupExtension

Sets the backup extension properties on a virtual machine.

In this Article

Syntax

Set-AzureRmVMBackupExtension [-ResourceGroupName] <String> [-VMName] <String> [-Name] <String> [-Tag] <String>
 [<CommonParameters>]

Examples

1:

PS C:\>

Parameters

-Name
Type:String
Aliases:ExtensionName
Required:True
Position:3
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-ResourceGroupName
Type:String
Required:True
Position:1
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-Tag
Type:String
Required:True
Position:3
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-VMName
Type:String
Aliases:ResourceName
Required:True
Position:2
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
